Name: Christmas Rhythm
About the game: This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Christmas aficionados everywhere! Six merry songs with two difficulty settings. The easy mode has you controlling Rudolph as he collects candy canes to the beat. Hard mode will test your reflexes as Santa Claus tries to catch the snowflakes. Jingle Bells We Wish You a Merry Christmas Deck the Halls Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy Silent Night Ave Maria [How to Play] You must hit the notes at the right time [Main Menu] Left click....................................Choose a game [Normal Mode] Up/Down Arrow......................Move up or down Spacebar....................................Toggle Pause [Hard Mode] Left/Right Arrow...................Move left or right Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause [Pause Mode] Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause Left click..................................Choose to resume playing or go to Main Menu
